# Dominican Republic at the 2017 World Games

Dominican Republic competed at the 2017 World Games held in Wroc≈Çaw, Poland.

Karate
Deivis Ferreras won the bronze medal in the men's kumite 67 kg event.
Water skiing
Robert Pigozzi competed in the men's slalom event.
